acf.top_description:
When it comes to auditing your Magento store, Magento performance optimization has an essential role to play. Our team of certified experts makes sure to deliver the best results for any service you ask for. We implement fast caching when creating pages to achieve better server responses.

Magento performance optimization helps us to create many possibilities that will help your business engage with an online audience in a better way.

We create immense possibilities for you to engage your online audience with the help of Magento performance optimization services. We take complete care of your eCommerce platform requirements and keep everything aligned with system practices while we optimize the speed of your Magento based eCommerce website.

services.title: Performing Magento speed test and taking necessary Magento speed optimization steps.
Analysing your Magento 1 & 2 version's extensions to check if one of them is slowing the store.
Analysing your Magento database queries and response time.
Analysing your Magento theme to check the speed of your website.
Analyzing the Magento website for its services and external API calls.
Analysing server settings by tuning server optimization service.
Search for large images and files that might slow your site.
Search for JavaScript errors or files which are not loaded due to access restriction issues.

faqs.title: How do I know my store's current page load speed? Any Magento 2 test tool ?
faqs.description: Well, there are numerous external tools such as Google PageSpeed insights & GTMetrix. Plus, we have developed some confidential tools through which we check the speed of your Magento 2 store.

faqs.title: How many days will it take for you to completely optimize my Magento site ?
faqs.description: Timeline depends on the size of your store. The more number of page will lead to more number of days. We have to review your site to answer it.

faqs.title: Will the speed impact on my mobile site too ?
faqs.description: Of course, our Magento performance optimization service has one process in which we audit Magento store’s behaviour from mobile user’s end & accordingly we tunes your mobile site.

acf.happy_clients_title: What Our Happy Clients say about us!

testimonials.client_experience_description: After migrating my store from Shopify to Magento, my store was running with slow speed. To solve the problem, I pinged Mage Monkeys. Their team did an impressive job and helped me to achieve 90+ loading speed by performing Magento optimization service. I’m thankful to them.

Our digital marketing campaigns results were not as good as we expected. Thus when I discussed it with a techie friend, he advised me to make my site healthy & recommended Mage Monkeys. Their portfolio was impressive, but they got my project when they represented the document which was having all processes to make my site technically healthy. I trusted them and they helped me to solve numerous bugs & improved my site’s performance.

Basically I hired them to perform Magento 2 migration, but Mage Monkey’s technical knowledge awe me. The sales team introduced me to their Magento store optimization service. I gave a green light and availed the faster store.

optimization_services.title: Magento speed optimization services
optimization_services.description:
• Enable Magento caching.
  • Compress images.
  • Disable unneeded Magento modules.
  • Enable flat catalogs for smaller webshops.
  • W3C compliance.
  • Compress output in general.
  • Configure PHP options.
  • Session storage.
  • MySQL server tuning.

optimization_services.title: Why select Mage Monkeys?
optimization_services.description:
• We have offered performance optimization service to 50+ sites.
  • We’ll not only make the report but also execute with solutions.
  • Certified developers will work on your project. We use Google PageSpeed, GTMetrix & other trusted in-house tools to perform speed optimization.
  • Seamless communication through Phone/Skype/Chat/Email.
  • Works with latest technologies and development resources.
  • Flexible Working Hours.

optimization_services.title: Magento Performance Tuning Report
optimization_services.description:
• We’ll not only make a Magento optimisation report but also execute the solutions. Our report will include, Overall overview of your Magento speed optimization status and overall performance optimization.
  • Suggestions for extensions you might need to remove or replace.
  • We provide Suggestions for extensions that you need to add for better performance optimization.
  • Suggestions for external services which you might need to add to help you speed up your Magento store.
  • Fixes to your theme that should be done in order to optimize it.
  • In case of conflicts, we provide the solution for your site theme files and also for extensions
  • We make sure to include all the important information which could be useful to increase the speed of your Magento website.
  • To all our suggestion we add information about their importance and how they could improve your Magento site speed.
  • An estimation of how much time is needed to implement the changes and suggestion included in the report.

acf.black_box_content: When it comes to auditing your Magento store, Magento performance optimization has an essential role to play. Our team of certified experts makes sure to deliver the best results for any service you ask for. We implement fast caching when creating pages to achieve better server responses. Magento performance optimization helps us to create many possibilities that will help your business engage with an online audience in a better way.
